definitions.definition: A sharp pinch or jerk; a twist or twitch.

definitions.example: He is running so many tweaks it is hard to remember how it looked originally.

definitions.definition: An additional input to a block cipher, used in conjunction with the key to select the permutation computed by the cipher.
To pinch and pull with a sudden jerk and twist; to twitch.

definitions.example: If we tweak the colors towards blue, it will look more natural.

definitions.definition: To abuse methamphetamines, especially crystal meth.
To exhibit symptoms of methamphetamine abuse, such as extreme nervousness, compulsiveness, erratic motion, excitability; possibly a blend of twitch and freak.
To exhibit extreme nervousness, evasiveness when confronted by law enforcement or other authority (e.g., customs agents, border patrol, teacher, etc.), mimicking methamphetamine abuse symptoms.
